content:
Okay - I tried to look for a definition of maintained and -
I think if we would come up with some type of scoring methodology we could automate flagging unmaintained crates (especially when hooking into the "Community driven reflector" (Issue wg/42)
https://github.com/rust-secure-code/wg/issues/44
@pinkforest(she/her) I just wanted to note that my inbox has plenty of notifications from you and I will take a look at them in a week or so. I'm preoccupied right now.
